feature -- Initialization
f_make../tracker/remove_phase.xml#f_makemake (pid: FalseSTRING_8) local tracker_access: ../tracker/tracker_access.xmlTRACKER_ACCESS do ../tracker/command.xml#f_tracktrack := tracker_access.../tracker/tracker_access.xml#f_mM ../tracker/remove_phase.xml#f_p_idp_id := pid ../tracker/command.xml#f_statestate := ../tracker/command.xml#f_tracktrack.../tracker/tracker.xml#f_get_stateget_state if attached ../tracker/command.xml#f_tracktrack.../tracker/tracker.xml#f_get_phasesget_phases.Falseat (pid) as prev_phase then ../tracker/remove_phase.xml#f_p_namep_name := prev_phase.../tracker/phase.xml#f_get_nameget_name ../tracker/remove_phase.xml#f_p_capp_cap := prev_phase.../tracker/phase.xml#f_get_capacityget_capacity ../tracker/remove_phase.xml#f_p_materialsp_materials := prev_phase.../tracker/phase.xml#f_get_matsget_mats else ../tracker/remove_phase.xml#f_p_namep_name := "" ../tracker/remove_phase.xml#f_p_capp_cap := 0 ../tracker/remove_phase.xml#f_p_materialsp_materials := << >> end ../tracker/command.xml#f_msgmsg := ../tracker/command.xml#f_m_am_a.../tracker/messages_access.xml#f_okOk end
